amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.para: The purpose of the authority shall be to assist private institutions of higher education in the constructing, financing, and refinancing of projects and to administer and operate the Nebraska Health Education Assistance Loan Program as provided in sections 85-1754 to 85-1759 and the Nebraska Student Loan Assistance Program as provided in sections 85-1760 to 85-1762.
